q: Facebook group pleading for Sue to join the' X Factor' panel- and Jane Lynch agrees her character would make a "fantastic" judge, though she would probably clash with Simon Cowell . She said: People have asked me, "What about having Sue on` The X Factor'? How would she do?' I think she'd be fantastic- and there would be a few contestants reduced to tears. "It can never happen, though. Simon Cowell and Sue on the same judging panel will never work in a million years- there"s only room for one ego on the show!( c) BANG

Simon Cowell 's cutting edge is clearly missed. The reality is that people like their reality and talent shows to have a little bit of bite.
